response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit you. Given its high value to you, I understand it's worth $15,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This is a unique chance to secure an item that could potentially save you thousands in the long run. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 12000}
